feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.description: This App is under development - feedback in any kind of way is very appreciated!

notCaptured.title: Couldn't Capture
notCaptured.generalAdvice: Oops! Couldn’t grab all the event details. Try a clearer picture — blurs or missing info can trip us up!

permissionDenied.title: Permission denied
permissionDenied.cameraAdvice: You haven't granted permission to use the camera. To use Cap2Cal allow camera access in the app settings
permissionDenied.calendarAdvice: You haven't granted permission to access your calendar. To use the calendar export allow calendar access in the app settings
permissionDenied.photosAdvice: You haven't granted permission to access your photos. To use photo import allow photo library access in the app settings

phrase1.1: Just a moment, gathering all the details...
phrase1.3: Getting all the info ready for you!

phrase2.1: Hold on, fetching all the goodies...
phrase2.2: I’m on it, getting things ready...
phrase2.4: Let me wrap this up for you...
phrase2.5: Hold tight, final touches coming up!

phrase3.1: Collecting every bit of info I can...
phrase3.2: Just making sure it’s perfect for you...

phrase4.3: Looking through every detail for you...

phrase5.3: Just making those last few tweaks...
phrase5.5: Almost there, thanks for your patience!
